import React,{useState}from'react';import{uploadData}from'./api';// Ensure this path matches your project structure
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function DataUpload(){const[file,setFile]=useState(null);const[uploadMessage,setUploadMessage]=useState('');const handleFileChange=e=>{const files=e.target.files;if(files.length>0){setFile(files[0]);}};const handleDragOver=e=>{e.preventDefault();};const handleDrop=e=>{e.preventDefault();const files=e.dataTransfer.files;if(files.length>0){setFile(files[0]);}};const handleUpload=async()=>{if(file&&file.type==='text/csv'){try{await uploadData(file);setUploadMessage('File uploaded successfully!');}catch(error){setUploadMessage('Error uploading file.');}}else{setUploadMessage('Please select a CSV file.');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"DataUpload",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-title",children:"Upload Data"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"drag-drop-area",onDragOver:handleDragOver,onDrop:handleDrop,onClick:()=>document.getElementById('file-upload').click(),children:["Drag and drop a CSV file here or click to select a file",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"file-upload",type:"file",style:{display:'none'},onChange:handleFileChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:uploadMessage}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleUpload,children:"Upload"})]});}export default DataUpload;
